snippet: ZIEGELMAN--Marjorie, aged 90, passed away on April 23. Devoted wife of Aaron, loving mother of daughters Jane and Amy and their husbands Icho and Andrew, and doting grandmother of Etai, Emma, Buster, and Edward. She possessed an inimitable sense of style and for many years was a dedicated volunteer for many charitable causes. She will be missed by her family and many friends. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ZIEGELMAN--Marjorie, aged 90, passed away on April 23. Devoted wife of Aaron, loving mother of daughters Jane and Amy and their husbands Icho and Andrew, and doting grandmother of Etai, Emma, Buster, and Edward. She possessed an inimitable sense of style and for many years was a dedicated volunteer for many charitable causes. She will be missed by her family and many friends. 1/3
